tasks.test:coverage: deno test -A tests_deno/lcov_test.ts --coverage=cov_profile && deno coverage cov_profile --lcov > coverage.lcov
tasks.test:coverage:full: deno test --no-check -A --ignore=_reference,examples,src/fga --coverage=cov_profile && deno coverage cov_profile --lcov > coverage.lcov
tasks.test:coverage:report: deno test -A tests_deno/lcov_test.ts --coverage=cov_profile && deno coverage cov_profile --lcov > coverage.lcov && deno run -A scripts/coverage-report.ts
tasks.prebuild:api: deno run -A scripts/codegen/prebuild.ts $(find ./vendor/openapi -name 'workos-*.json' -type f | sort -r | head -n 1 || echo './scripts/codegen/detect_adapter.ts')
tasks.generate:api: deno task prebuild:api && DENO_DIR=.deno_codegen_cache deno run -A scripts/codegen/build.ts && deno fmt packages/workos_sdk/generated && deno check packages/workos_sdk/generated/**/*.ts
